description: Single storey rear/side infill extension; roof extension to rear (main) roofslope involving raising of roof ridge height; rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope including roof terrace with privacy screening; and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 100047474 (Location Plan); 2021246 01 (Existing Plans and Elevations); 2021246 202 Rev A (Proposed Plans & Elevations); 2021246 203 (Sections and Construction Notes).
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless otherwise stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| Prior to the first use of the hereby approved roof terrace, the privacy screens identified on the approved drawings listed under condition 2 shall be installed. The privacy screens shall be retained for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
